skillTree.localised_description: Waystalkers are no more than their next hunt. Every breath advances their chase, bringing them closer to victory.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +15% during forest battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Only few can receive blessing of mighty God of the Hunt.
When the arrow flies farther, it may kill sooner, which is vital in the Hunt.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
By all means summon the bloodthirsty Goddess of the Hunt to assist you, but always make sure you thank her afterwardsâ€¦
The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.
Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.
When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Once the sun sets, the Waystalker leaves camp, returning before dawn to deliver their report.
The enemies of Athel Loren will fall.
Waystalkers move unseen, unheard, and unnoticed.
Our arrows can kill from any distance.
The perils of Athel Loren are far greater than the pathetic machinations of mortals.
The Lord sets their eye upon the foe, imbuing their troops with Kurnous' spirit and the will to see his enemies destroyed.
Waystalkersâ€™ keen eyes can spot an enemy at a distance that defies belief, and so they demand the same of their troops.
There is always another way.
Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! Itâ€™s just going to make me mad.
Sometimes itâ€™s best to have friends in low places.
Always watching.

skillTree.localised_description: Theyâ€™ve all heard the stories of this oneâ€™s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +1%
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Those whom the Mage Queen has favoured fight as if powered by her hand.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

Melee attack: +2 during forest battles
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The first arrow of battle must fly truest.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
Atop a great pyramid in the highest heaven, Asuryan watches over the world alone and has never been seen by mortals.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Great Eagle and Hawk Rider units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Whatever the motivation, legend tells that when Asuryan learned of Hoeth's actions, he rebuked the Lord of Wisdom, and in punishment, set much of Hoeth's great library ablaze.
As the goddess of nature, Isha taught the Elves how to care for the land and gain a plentiful harvest.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: By tradition, she is the only goddess to any longer walk the mortal world, and there are tales of her coming to the aid of those lost amidst the mists of Yvresse or upon the trackless ocean.
It is claimed that she reads the intention written in the heart of every elf and judges them not by their deeds, but by their hearts desire.
The Elf legends tell that Loec often saves the souls of the dead from Slaanesh by tricking the Dark Prince out of his prize.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Enslaved to Khaine's will, Vaul is forced to make weapons of extraordinary power for the War God's eternal battle against the great enemy.
